entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is described as an enthusiastic collector who had been outbid at auction. He is also mentioned to have looked down at Harry in surprise.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a Muggle-born friend and is described as speaking coldly to Slughorn.

entities.name: dirk cresswell
entities.description: Dirk Cresswell is mentioned as a student of Slughorn's who was Muggle-born.

relationships.description: Slughorn mentions that Harry's mother was one of his all-time favorite students.
Slughorn mentions Dirk Cresswell as a student who was Muggle-born.
